text: @NYGovCuomo I am not a fan of Cuomo, but this is def a step in the right direction + as far as the US Navy hospital ship not being fully utilised it was to treat nonCOVID19 patients. Many NYers that were hospitalised were COVID19. They were overprepared for hospital needs that fell secondary
